website_summaries.verdict: A natural mousse that can hang with the best of them, and you can feel good about putting it in your hair.
pros: Holds curls in place for hours
cons: Some complain that it leaves hair feeling a little sticky

customer_reviews.title: Too many defective pumps
customer_reviews.text: I have bought about 5 of these over several years. The pump is essential to create the foam. On nearly every bottle, the pump starts to stick in the down position just weeks after starting the bottle. This means that I have to pull the pump up every time before using it. What a pain. A couple of the pumps simply broke from being pulled up so many times. Giovanni needs to fix their pumps. In fairness to the quality of the mousse, it's good. It is medium hold and works well for me. So I don't give up on this product in utter frustration, I poured the mousse into an empty foaming hand sanitizer container. THAT pump never fails.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence T.

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works  <3
customer_reviews.text: I have baby-fine, thin hair, and it's been a struggle to find products that actually volumize my hair instead of weighing it down. I had resigned myself to my "Blow It Up" overpriced chemicals-in-a-can product until discovering this on Amazon and reading the rave reviews. I will have this on "Subscribe and Save" forever! I just wrote a review for the "D-Tox" soap as well and am going to try some Giovanni hairspray next. It's hard to believe that natural products can work so well and be so cost-effective! No more settling for toxic mainstream products for me. Much gratitude to Giovanni, Amazon and the Amazon community.
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean05

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: It volumizes my hair very well. But I have very fine, thin hair. It just coats it in this strange greasy coat. It then weighs my hair down and makes it very greasy. I can't get it out with shampoo (sulfates or not). I had to wash my hair with baking soda to get it out. Maybe it will work great for you!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Karounos

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: If your a curly girl you need to try. It does have a cast but not strong, I easily break it with some oil or cream...it softens right up. Great product. I’ve been using everyday...I do apply in the shower on very wet hair and scrunch.
customer_reviews.author: Shanno

customer_reviews.title: 2 pumps in short hair = Great hold! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love this natural product for my husband and 4yr old. We’re on our 4th bottle in a year. A couple pumps holds my husband’s straight, fine hair and my son’s soft, wavy hair to the side until washed or sweated out! Texture looks and feels great, not sticky, just slick and smooth, but immovable! My son can go to sleep on it without washing and the next day I’ll just add a little water and brush it back to the side with my fingers and don’t need to add anymore product to get a nice, light hold.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foam for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a salon foam for years that I buy from a salon across the country. Looking for something else that would do the same - lightweight, not sticky, doesn't "stick" the hair together into clumps. Yep, this seemed to do what I wanted it to do. I have shorter hair, very thick, wavy, and salon colored. So, worked for me!!
customer_reviews.author: dragondancer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this mousse made my hair sticky and it felt like it was coated with glue. Didn't matter if I used a lot, a little, dry hair, wet hair... Just, gross feeling. I have fine 2b/c curls and was looking for something lightweight to keep a hold of the curls throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Was looking for some natural hair products and found lots of shampoos but not so much in the styling products category. The foam doesn't seem like it will do much but it really does work well on my hair to give it some body and weight. I have very straight, fine hair and I can really appreciate any product that increases the hold and volume of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using another salon brand mousse for years on my 3A/3B curly hair. I became allergic to the preservative ingredients in my hair products and stumbled across Giovanni in my search for something natural. It’s been a game changer for me. I’m so grateful for this product that offers superb hold without damaging allergic reactions on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: I used to follow the curly girl method, and have naturally wavy/curly hair. I really wanted a moose that was lightweight and absorbed into my hair rather than create a hard cast. this reminds me of the shea moisture hibiscus mousse. very lightweight my hair loves it and it helps with my clumps. and I can follow up with Ozzy Insta freeze gel for a hard cast and long-term hold or a more light weight cream gel or moose for a lighter cast. definitely helps with frizz. my hair is fine yet textured. definitely loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxiegirlie77

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. The only hair mousse I use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this three-pack item a second time when I ran out of my first three pack. Use it in the morning before going to work. Really holds very well when blow drying my hair. Once I have dried my hair, the mousse holds my style very well. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley!

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight with good hold
customer_reviews.text: I looooooove this stuff. Perfect for my fine wavy hair that is easily weighed down. Little to no build up after prolonged use. I do use a gel with this for more hold and structure, but I used it alone once and didn't have tragic results.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great hold
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job at giving my fine hair lift, and it holds throughout the day. I put it on roots and blow dry for lift. Or scrunch on ends and let air dry for some waves. It’s not very shiny. Has a more natural finish. Gave it four stars for the smell. I have a very picky nose!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Holds really well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I've bought from Giovanni and I am so pleased with the quality and effectiveness of the hold in the products. I have difficult hair and so many fly aways but with this handy its a night and day difference. I'll never again go without.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this mousse works with my hair! So much so, that I took it with me on vacation ... only to discover that the liquid had seeped out and spilled all over inside my toiletries bag! I had the larger, outer cap snapped on but had long since disposed of the inner, tiny cap that just covers the spritzer. So, now the product is used at-home only. Maybe they'll create a more spill-proof container?
customer_reviews.author: Tis_Herself

customer_reviews.title: Good combo to have in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for sometime now. No complaints. works well for my needs. Decent ingredients as well, which was my criteria for selecting it in the first place. Thank you Giovanni . I use your gel and hair spritz as well. Good combo to have in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: G.D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Shorted Product but Received Credit
customer_reviews.text: Only received on of the bottles out of the three-pack but Amazon issued a credit refund. I like this product. It has a little hold but not much and never crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieCat

customer_reviews.title: Moose :)
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product doesn't leave your hair stick feeling when dry. Brushes thru nicely and easy to refresh with a little water good too go.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. It smells like chemicals and I looked up ingredients and found it’s not good for hair health. I will be giving all three bottles away and going back to Raw Curls.
customer_reviews.author: SteveSpencer824

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it’s a bad product at all!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could use the product in a certain manner but that didn’t work out to well! Still experimenting with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair & sensitive scalp
customer_reviews.text: I really like this natural mousse. I have been using it for about a year now. It gives nice body to my fine hair & doesn't bother my sensitive scalp. Organic & 100% vegetarian ingredients. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am having trouble with the pump on the bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: I am having trouble with the pump on the bottles. The pump won't go back up after you push it down when dispensing the foam. It is very aggravating when trying to use this product. The hold on my curls after I use the product is OK .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pashnick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic you only need a little and the volume is phenomenal!!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy watson

customer_reviews.title: Great mousse; improves body and style control- just like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mousse; improves body and style control- just like a regular mousse or better. Also no allergies to this, which I love!
customer_reviews.author: healingcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well & it's a safer solution to hair styling products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Gemma

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great holding power
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use and the saying power of it's hold.
customer_reviews.author: jo's op

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this mousse. Love the organic ingredients. I never get scalp itch from product over use and it helps me style my hair perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mmsolutions

customer_reviews.title: RETAILER IS A BIG RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest ripoff. When I bought this product again I thought I was buying a package of 3 like I normally do. Only one came. And to top it off it is not returnable. I will never order from this retailer again. The price is inflated 3x.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Natural and effective
customer_reviews.text: Do not like spending a lot of money on my "hair care" products, however the natural product makes my wife happy and I am extremely happy with how it works. At the store it was 8.99 so the 3 pack was like getting one for free which made my wallet happy.
customer_reviews.author: Otter1973

customer_reviews.title: My hair is looking amazing with this product
customer_reviews.text: My hair is looking amazing with this product. Two pumps and it gets the job done. Comes off easily and my scalp has not been irritated by it nor has my hair looked damaged or dry from using it so far
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: ... had natural ingredients and it does well for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mouse that had natural ingredients and it does well for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love Giovanni products
customer_reviews.text: Love Giovanni products. This stuff works well for my curly hair. Provides a hold, but doesn't do much for keeping clumps together. I usually have to run a super super tiny layer of gel over the top of my hair after applying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Only thing that would make it better is for it to be unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! A light hold, but really makes a difference on my fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Post

customer_reviews.title: Love this mousse!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this mousse when I was pregnant and I wanted to switch to products without all the toxic ingredients. It works very well (surprisingly well), gives my hair body etc. Smells good too so thats a plus. No shaking necessary, just pump the foam out and work through your hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but from July when I first ordered it the price has gone up substantially. I need to rethink another purchase (which I was just about to do) and/or look for another product. Boo!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for several years and love it because it works and does not use animal ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several years and love it because it works and does not use animal products or experiment on animals. I buy from Amazon because it is less expensive and comes right to my door quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pack of three and came one in a box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and no flakes like the other mousse i used to use. 4 stars Updated review: with the new 20% price increase the value has dropped. 3 stars Was buying at $17, now it's between $21-26 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair feel stiff
customer_reviews.text: It left my hair a little too stiff for me. I even used less the second time and still stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Christi E.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: gives good texture. I choose this over another because it doesn't use chemicals to spray. i try to buy as natural products as possible. some of them haven't worked so well. this one does
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: old friend
customer_reviews.text: i've used this product for a few years and always have it on hand... besides washing my hair in rain water, this is the 2nd product on my list for helping give my hair the "do" i like...
customer_reviews.author: lovetodecorate

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and very good for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and very good for my hair. I will continue to use it and throw my other mouse products away.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Natural style
customer_reviews.text: Really great holding product. Helps my hair stay and have great body. You do need to come it through quite well or it will actually get stiff. It's also a very natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Edds

customer_reviews.title: Greatest mousse ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mousse. Works great with curly hair. Defines curl and doesn't leave it sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a replacement for Aveda Phomollient hair styling foam. This works pretty well. I use a round brush. Giovanni has a little resistance. All in all I'm pretty happy with it and it's way cheaper then Aveda product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky.  little goes far
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't leave hair stiff. Works great
customer_reviews.author: JeLOTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great hair styling mousse.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this along with the Neutrogena non-residue shampoo and my hair feel much softer and lighter. The mousse give a nice volume and doesn't leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: JBaber

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why others like it
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find a substitude for Fekkai, this one didn't work out for me. Too liquidish. Not a repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Light foam that holds your style
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for several years. It doesn't weight down my hair, which is fine and straight. But it adds body and holds the style.
customer_reviews.author: zizi

customer_reviews.title: Great mousse and cruelty free - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, ethical and cruelty free but also works brilliantly in bringing out natural curls and waves in hair. The foam is not heavy so does not drag the hair down like other mousses I have tried. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a spiky hairdo and this product does a great job of helping my hair defy gravity, and at the end of the day it brushes out clean.
customer_reviews.author: catlady4ever

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It smells great and holds curl in my thin hair! As good as ny salon brand I've purchased!
customer_reviews.author: HaleYeah8

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from my local co-op, but the price on Amazon can't be beat! It's not a strong hold like most mousse, but it doesn't contain as many harmful chemicals. I'd recommend this to anyone who needs a light mousse and wants to avoid the harsh chemicals in most brands! As long as you don't mind that its unscented... I also use the Giovanni FRIZZ BE GONE product, which works well and has a very pleasant smell!
customer_reviews.author: livefreely25

customer_reviews.title: I like this heat styling foam
customer_reviews.text: I like this heat styling foam. It doesn't have a smell, it is not greasy. Just perfect for my hairs
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna Davtyan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My scalp itched and broke out sorry not good product
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Natural, soft feel to your hair and keeps its style!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Czurak

customer_reviews.title: Good but dries my hair out
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars, but after two months of using this I have noticed it is drying out my hair, which does not help my split ends. :( Other than that it’s great! By the end of the day my hair has a wavy flow and it doesn’t look wet/crunchy as regular moose would. Plus I love that it doesn’t test on animals. I will continue to use this until I find something better. I have natural wavy hair, but thinner than most women.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very good option for avoiding the icky
customer_reviews.text: A very good "clean" ingredient list option for a little volume and control. Scent is not unpleasant or overpowering. I also use the Giovanni Tea Tree shampoo & conditioner on my fine hair and enjoy it. I have also tried the hairspray but do not like the scent. It is also very sticky at the pump.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. H. Brugman

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product before , but I couldn't find it in the regular stores. At Amazon found it right away and very conveniently comes in a 3 bottles package. It is not greasy and leaves hair manageable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ruben darios  "ruby"

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and highly recommend. Works great on my curly hair. All three in my bundle didn't include caps which was weird. The only reason i am not giving five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works well on fine hair
customer_reviews.text: It works well on my fine hair... gives it some body with out weighing it down. No perfumy smells. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waters

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing really remarkable about this mousse except it's rather horrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: It works decently. There is nothing really remarkable about this mousse except it's rather horrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin and this mousse gives it the body it needs. I love it and have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: A wee bit drying but doesn't cause as much it itchinging as other products.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Unable to open
customer_reviews.text: The lid won'the even budge to open. Must be warped or other damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my stylist for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my hair stylist because I have curly hair that is very fine / thin and so it easily can look flat on top. She recommended that I use this foaming mousse when I get out of the shower and not blowdry my hair, and it's been an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: The package(shipping box) was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottle was leaking when I opened the box. The package(shipping box) was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sofi

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hair Product Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine, thin, limp, and straight. I've spent the last 40 years trying to find products that will boost my volume and help retain curl. It's hard to find something that really works. It's harder yet to find one that works but doesn't have creepy chemicals that likely cause cancer. This product boosts the volume in my hair. It's lightweight. It locks in curl. It doesn't flake, like some products do when you brush your hair on the second day. And. . . no creepy chemicals!!! Hair bliss starts here. I could not be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 bottle, not 3
customer_reviews.text: Amazon screwed up the quantity. Advertised, ordered and invoiced for 3 bottles at a good price, only received 1 bottle. Had to go through the hassle of attempting to explain and ask for the remaining 2 bottles but as usual a simple and fair solution was difficult to process. They could only refund me so at least I got to keep the 1 bottle without cost. Thankfully I didn't need the other 2 immediately. This Giovanni product is AWESOME for my fine, thin and limp hair. It works best when applied damp and using an electric hair dryer. Can really get my natural waves to stand out and hold even in damp weather.
customer_reviews.author: Finicky J

customer_reviews.title: Great for men and women.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a while and find it to great help in maintaining healthy-looking hair. It has very little smell but works as advertised. You can pay more at a local store but the amazon bundle is the irresistible price. It is not greasy and/or thick but gentle easy/smooth and good looks. Try the bundle and be happy, that is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: vegassurf

customer_reviews.title: Nice mousse
customer_reviews.text: Love the price A little goes a long ways. I just use one pump rub it with my hands and put in my hair. I have short fine hair and it holds the hair in place with no problem. Especially in the back of my head where my hair is thinner. I don't have to use hair spray. Just recomb it a little and the style stays for days. Good product
customer_reviews.author: cabinfever

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find natural products without chemicals that actually work as well as their chemical-full counterparts. This product is great! It doesn't weigh hair down. Gives life, volume & hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curly Girl Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not many mousses work for the Curly Girl method so I was happy to find this one and have used 3 bottles of it so far. My hair gets weighed down easily so the lighter mousse formula is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because it is not tested on animals. It is very light weight and helps hold a little wave and helps with some of the frizz. Not for thick, heavy, or moderately curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent hair product
customer_reviews.text: quickly thickens ultra thin hair and allows styling that adds volume and stays for hours
customer_reviews.author: pcoe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold at all
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, medium short hair and was hoping for a natural product that would hold a style. This product did not deliver. My hair has been flat and lifeless. Sad I bought a three pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie A Summerhays

customer_reviews.title: Expected a better hold, & after reading the reviews was surprised ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with this product. Expected a better hold, & after reading the reviews was surprised it left my hair feeling like I just sprayed a can of hairspray on my hair. It made my hair dry & almost waxy feeling. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly great for my fine, blond hair. I can use this with wet or dry hair and it gives me volume, plus a bit of shine. I can make my hair more wavy, or just give it overall volume, depending on what tools I use. I love Giovanni products, and am glad to get this mousse in bulk at such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: watery and not working
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this foam for a year, and always loved it, the hold was very good. This time it's very watery, and it seems diluted. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mousse for years and even with my fine straight hair I always get a straight result.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair, and this product just makes it look ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, as I was looking for a healthier/safer alternative to hair mousse, but this is not for me... I have fine hair, and this product just makes it look dull and greasy, no volume or shine... =( Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: I love that this product is organic and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is organic and affordable. Most organic products are way too pricey and don't work all that well. This gives my hair just enough volume and body.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: I Hope This Mousse Formula Remains Unchanged.
customer_reviews.text: Adds volume to my fine hair and seems to blend grey hair in so that it is not so obvious. Also gets a fairly good rating from the Cosmetic Data Base of the Environmental Working group, as one of the lower toxicity hair products.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair styling product for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. I never buy any other type of mousse. This product meets all my expectations without a sticky or brittle build up in my hair. I purchased it through Amazon because it is difficult to find in my area and it was a great price (especially with the free shipping). Highly recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow it feels so much better on skin
customer_reviews.text: This works just like the chemical stuff dose very impressive
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN HILT

customer_reviews.title: YUCK YUCK YUCK
customer_reviews.text: Hate it!! Does not do as advertised. makes my hair feel yucky and NO body
customer_reviews.author: T. Presswood

customer_reviews.title: Not a good natural mousse!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't add any body to my hair and was kinda sticky! Will keep looking for a good natural mousse.
customer_reviews.author: melissah

customer_reviews.title: Easy curl definition
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the curls looking good, my hair goes from messy to curly with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky and hair feels super soft after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foam mousse, and was delighted to find it on Amazon. I have very fine, straight hair, and don't like a lot of heavy product in it. I use this after my hair has dried a bit, and it goes a long way in styling.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The Best.
customer_reviews.text: Best mousse iv ever had. Iv tried alot of mousse products and this one by far is the best.
customer_reviews.author: "INTERNET BUYER"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few years. Will keep reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have super curly grey hair. This product when put on wet hair right after the shower makes my hair have no frizz, its finally manageable, hangs in ringlets. This is an amazing product and I hope they never stop making it. I use 10 pumps just before i leave the shower on wet hair. I usually only have to completely wash my hair twice a week. The other days just wet it and use a couple of pumps. It is so light, not at all sticky. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hair product
customer_reviews.text: This mousse works well for my baby fine hair...it is lightweight and My hair remains soft but allows me to style my hair without looking too processed with product.
customer_reviews.author: rekd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband won't use anything else to style his pretty head. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only mousse my wife will use. She loves it because it keeps her hair in its place.
customer_reviews.author: K Cruz

customer_reviews.title: OK but not sold on this product
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels dirty after 2 days. Not sure I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: carol p

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Mousse
customer_reviews.text: I love this mousse. I never thought an all natural product would be this good. It looks like clear liquid in the bottle but then pumps out all foamy.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Lady

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I just am being partial to NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Lil Miss Allergic here. Have no issues with this product, I love it, I just am being partial to NOT liking the floral smell of pretty much anything, so that's my own issue. If it was vanilla? Oh, Id be investing stock in it. it works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: loosie

product_meta.title: GIOVANNI Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam, 7 oz. , Lightweight for Natural Curls, Medium to Firm Hold, Wash & Go, No Parabens, Color Safe (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description:
Giovanni Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam adds volume, texture, and body to any hair style. This styling foam builds hair to amazing heights with amazing stay-power.

Giovanni was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. 

He worked for a time with hairstylist icon Gene Shacove and was good friends with “the father of hair color,” Al Lapin. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. 

Since 1979 the Giovanni Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance.

Giovanni is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.
feature_bullets: FIRM HOLD: Giovanni Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam adds volume, texture, and body to any hair style. This styling foam builds hair to amazing heights with amazing stay-power.

DEFINED STYLE: Lift off to new heights with Giovanni Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam. With the ability to easily distribute throughout hair, this styling foam adds texture and shine without dulling or stripping color.
COLOR SAFE: Giovanni Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam is 100% color-safe, nourishing hair with ingredients such as Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, and Lavender without stripping color.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: Giovanni Products use a number of organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified cruelty-free, meaning that Giovanni products are never tested on animals!
SULFATE-FREE & PARABEN-FREE: Giovanni products do not contain any sulphates, parabens or other harsh chemicals commonly used in regular hair products, leaving you with strong, beautiful hair.
